name: There Will Be Flying (It's the Nature of Cycling)
description:
There are times when body, bike, and mind come together to form a perfect space. Biker and bike are in sync; there is a heightened awareness of the elements; it feels as though you are flying. 
You cannot predict these experiences; you can only keep riding and increase their probability.

This 24" x 32" painting on up-cycled wood celebrates flying by bike. The recycled wheels are sourced from our local bike co-op, and the lights are battery-operated LEDs.

name: The Advantages of Co-Pilots
description:
Sometimes its fun (and necessary) to go it alone, but there's nothing quite like a long ride with friends.  Riding partners help change flats, fend off wild beasts, appreciate our (long) bike stories and obsessions with weird fashion. 

We celebrate our co-pilots with this 24"x 32" painting composed of earth-friendly acrylics, recycled wood, and big love for cycling camaraderie!

name: Robots Love Bikes
description:
Let's celebrate the unique qualities of a world populated with cyclists. Go forth and replicate! Ride long and venture wide! 

Our robot-loving painting measures 24" x 32" and was constructed with reclaimed wood and bike parts from the local co-op. The small attached wheel is threaded with battery-operated LED lights.

name: Meditation in Motion
description:
Sometimes the best place to rest your mind or calm your thoughts is when you're out riding. Like walking meditation, the motion of riding your bike balances out nicely with being in the present moment and staying alert to your present environment.  

This 24" x 32" painting was constructed with reconditioned wood and recycled bike parts. Battery-operated LED lights are threaded throughout the attached wheel.

name: Thought Experiments
description:
The bike is the perfect vehicle to move you from imagination to reality (and back to imagination). You have to believe you can climb that hill in order to make the summit.  

Our 24" x 32" acrylic painting on up-cycled wood comes with its own reconditioned bike wheel and battery-operated LED lights. All paints are eco-friendly and the bike parts are sourced from our local bike co-op.

name: Dating Cycles (You Spin Me Around, Baby)
description:
Cycles challenge us. We go up, we come down. We have good days and so on. But we are resilient; we live to ride. Even the bad days on a bike are better than any day without...
(yeah, this has almost nothing to do with dating)

This 24" x 32" painting is made from re-conditioned wood, used bike parts, and high-quality acrylics. The attached wheel is threaded with battery-operated  LED lights.

name: The Randonneurs
description:
A few hours on the seat of a bike isn't challenging enough for some cyclists.  Back in 1891 a few pros thought multi-day bike events were the all the rage, and several years later even the non-pros wanted  in on the fun. If this torture sounds like a good time, the randonneurs are waiting for you.

This 24" x 32" painting on reconditioned wood supports a recycled bike wheel, used chainrings, and battery-operated LED lights. House paint and eco-friendly acrylics were used in the construction of the piece. All bike parts were sourced from our local bike co-op.

name: Bike 2.0
description:
Life is a journey of cadence coordination, especially when you're joined together with a partner on a bike!

This 24" x 32" painting was constructed using recycled wood, high-quality acrylics, a re-purposed bike wheel, and a tiny hub of bright blue LED lights. 3 AAA batteries included.

name: Sustain-Able
description:
There is wisdom in the yin and the yang of going hard, enduring the pace, and then holding back just enough for the tail end of a long ride. If we ride smart today, we ride tomorrow... 

Our 24" x 32" painting was constructed with house paint and high-grade acrylics, recycled wood, used chainrings, a re-purposed bike wheel, and battery-operated LED lights.

name: Harvest Cycles
description:
Every season boasts its gifts and its challenges. But in the general order of things, life is much improved from the seat of a bike.

This 24" x 32" painting supports a bike wheel and red battery-operated LED lights.  All paints are eco-friendly, and the wood up-cycled. The bike parts are sourced from our local bike co-op.

name: The Mother Road
description:
The mythical journey, the freedom, the small town and forgotten past can be found again on Route 66.  This iconic stretch of highway may be your next call to adventure. Check out the American Cycling Association for bike maps and tips on travel.  

This 24" x 32" acrylic work on re-conditioned wood celebrates all touring adventures by bike.  The painting supports one recycled bike wheel strung with battery-operated LED lights.

name: The Big Bang and the Bicycle
description:
Our growing bicycle community is the dawn of a new consciousness. And if a passionate reverence for all things bike seems over the top, how about the latest reports that suggest this pedal-powered machine is helping revitalize local economies across the globe!

This 24" x 32" acrylic painting on up-cycled wood comes with its own reconditioned bike wheel and battery-operated LED lights!
All paints are eco-friendly, and the bike parts are sourced from our local bike co-op!

name: Rev-O-Lution
description:
We honor the road warriors who make a difference in our communities.  A big thank you to all the activists and bike shops and all the amazing people working together to create a big, wide bikey lane.

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Velo Veritas
description:
Bike truths: save money, get fit, make friends, avoid gridlock, be outside, work off stress, need we say more? So many good reasons to ride; go long and venture wide.


Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles and can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Original Bike Tribe
description:
Most of us started out on a tricycle, which led many of us to a bicycle. No matter what you ride today, or wear, or whether you clip in or not, ride the hills, roads, or both, remember to wave, ring your bell, and say hi to your fellows. #let'sgrowthisthing

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Power in the Pedal
description:
The bike community is growing, and the advantages are dramatically outweighing the inconveniences. There are more bikes than ever, more styles meeting a wider variety of needs, and the increased demand is influencing public policy. There's definitely Power in the Pedal.

 Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, LED string lights and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles and 3 AAA batteries for the string. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Girls on Bikes (we love 'em)
description:
Yeah, we love girls on bikes! The numbers of women and girls on bicycles continues to grow, and this is good news for everyone. Like the hub of a wheel, the women in our communities have a profound impact on this growing industry.    

Alter someone's consciousness with a girls on bikes with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. It can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: (We) Climb Volcanoes
description:
Mountain Bikers are as enthusiastic about their sport as the roadies, maybe even more so. Their bikes are awesome, the clothes much cooler, and they love the adventures found on the trails. Pay homage and grab some hill climbing fun with the MTBrs!

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Agents of Change
description:
We pay homage to all the people working to make cycling a safe and accessible form of transportation. Honor the work and coordination required to manifest these bike lanes and paths by getting on your bike and taking a ride. (Also, try checking out your local advocacy group.)

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Velo City
description:
Urban and rural transportation continues to evolve, and bicycles are figuring prominently into these changes. It's not a trend, it's a lifestyle change when you decide to ride a bike. The next time you're on a roll, remember that you're part of an amazing and diverse growing community. And there's more good news: bike paths and bike lanes are great examples of people and policy working well together. 

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: The Bike Adventurist
description:
You'll find bike adventurists riding with a group some days and solo on the others. No ride is too long or too daunting (or boring) if they've signed up. 

Alter someone's consciousness with an homage to bike adventurists. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d celebration of cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles and can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Revolution Evolution
description:
People on bikes are transforming communities everywhere. Growing numbers of bike paths and lanes are emerging as vital connections to local, sustainable, and healthier lifestyles. Long live the bike revolution!   

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles and can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Bike Minded
description:
The bicycle (or bicycles) is your gravitational center. The percentage of bike clothes in your wardrobe is slowly replacing your 'grown-up' clothing, and your bike fantasies are slowly taking up more space in your brain. Non-cyclists may think you're weird, but we think you're amazing.

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, LED battery-operated string lights, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar also comes with LED battery-operated candles. Alters can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel. 
(lights show a pinkish hue in the photograph but are actually red)

name: Alternate Periods of Purpose and Wandering
description:
Sometimes we ride hard and other times we're tailwinds all the way. Even if you're commuting to work every day, no two rides are the same. 

This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to the varieties of cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles and can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Red Shift
description:
No-drop group rides are nice. And then there are the other kind of  rides that demand everything out of you just to hang onto the back. Getting dropped is no fun, but keep at it and you'll become a better, faster, and more powerful rider.  

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to cycling is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, LED string lights, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar also comes with LED battery-operated candles and can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: The Bike Church
description:
There are a growing number of bike co-ops in the U.S. referred to as 'bike churches'. These amazing shops offer everything from free work spaces to reconditioned bikes to skill-building workshops and low-cost bike parts. If you want to ride, build, or learn anything about bikes, look for a bike church near you!   


Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to amazing bike churches everywhere is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Honor the Quaddess (on your left)
description:
Women are strong riders; they are determined and powerful forces of cycling awesomeness, and the sport is better because of their influence. Next on the agenda? More women, more families, more sports sponsorship!

Alter someone's consciousness about the importance of women and cycling with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to the quaddess is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: Bike City
description:
Transportation in urban areas continues to change, and cycling is taking center stage in the evolution. Whether you're a bike commuter, a recreational cyclist, or a member of your local race team, you're likely enjoying the increasing numbers of shared-use paths and bike lanes. Show your support and keep on rolling!  

Alter someone's consciousness with an altar. This 8.5"w x 17"h x 3.5"d homage to all those who support bikes in cities is constructed with re-purposed wood, bike parts, and eco-friendly acrylic paints.  Each altar comes with LED battery-operated candles. They can be hung on the wall or placed upon a mantel.

name: The Nature of Cycling
description:
Cycling is beauty; it is an odd and persistent itch; it is communal and solo; it is full of ego and big stories, but it's also generous and forgiving and wonderful. Cycling is not just about machines and wicking fabrics, distance and speed, it's about people and their journeys across this big world.

Our regular crew neck t-shirts are hand-dyed and hand-printed using eco-friendly dyes and inks. All original designs are stenciled onto soft, cotton shirts. We print and dye for consistency, but each product is, ultimately, a one-of-a-kind item.  See our size chart to find your best fit options.

name: We Climb Volcanoes
description:
Regardless of your riding experience or skill, you likely understand the feeling of zen when you're out on your bike - especially when you're heading off-road and into the hills.

Our regular crew neck t-shirts are hand-dyed and hand-printed using eco-friendly dyes and inks. All original designs are stenciled onto soft, cotton shirts. We print and dye for consistency, but each product is, ultimately, a one-of-a-kind item.  See our size chart to find your best fit options.

name: Road Tested
description:
You've checked a few things off your bike bucket list and have stories to tell.  You're the rider who holds back when you feel like it and stomps when you choose. Lately, group rides are about catching up with your mates and showing the newbies how it's done.

Our regular crew neck t-shirts are hand-dyed and hand-printed using eco-friendly dyes and inks. All original designs are stenciled onto soft, cotton shirts. We print and dye for consistency, but each product is, ultimately, a one-of-a-kind item.  See our size chart to find your best fit options.

name: Roadie
description:
Rules are important to the roadie.  But depending on the rider's philosophy, certain rules are meant to be 'adjusted' for personal style. Regardless of what you wear or what you ride, keep on rolling, and let's grow this great big bikey world. 

Our loose crew t-shirts are hand-dyed and hand-printed using eco-friendly dyes and inks. All original designs are stenciled onto soft, cotton shirts. We print and dye for consistency, but each product is, ultimately, a one-of-a-kind item.  See our size chart to find your best fit options.

name: Sucking Diesel
description:
Irish slang  meet roadie slang. You've had good days on the bike, but they can't compare to this. Everything is lining up, and youve never rolled better. Keep it going, inspire us all, and may green lights and tailwinds shine upon you!

Our loose crew t-shirts are hand-dyed and hand-printed using eco-friendly dyes and inks. All original designs are stenciled onto soft,  cotton shirts. We print and dye for consistency, but each product is, ultimately, a one-of-a-kind item.  See our size chart to find your best fit options.
